---
Song: oru kAtril
Film: nAn kadavuL
---
Notes: s r3 g3 m2 p d3 n3 S

oru kA...tril alaiyum siragu endha nEram Oivu thEdum 
SS  SndnS n   dp  p   pmnpmg g g   sr r  g mp mg g

kaNNillA....dhu kANum kanavu edhai thEdi engu pO...gum
S  S  SndnS n   p p   pmnpmg mg    sr r  g mp mpmp gm g

engengum inbam irundhum 
S R  R   G G   GMG SRS

un pangu pOnathen..gE
S  R  R  G G GMGR  SRS

idhu yE..nendru bhadhil yAr solluvAr
SS   RSR R   Sd d  d    Sd  dR S dp

(oru kAtril)

Stanza 1:

yArkkum pOloru annai thandhai  unakkum irundhadhu uNdu 
n   S   nd nS  nSndp dpmg mgrs n.s r   gr  g  m   ndpgpdn

yArkkum pOloru dhEgam thA...gam unakkum vaLarndhathu in...gu 
n   S   nd nS  nSndp  dpmg mgrs n.s r   g r   g  m   ndpg pdn

yArkkum pO...lE vizhigaL irundhum ulagamO iruLil
nS  S   nSRS dp n S  S   nSRS dp  pd n RS SR SR

oLiyai pOlE Or thuNai 
nS G   R Sd nS G  R

vandhu sendra thunbam yArkkum uNdO
r  r   g   g  m   m   p   p   d nS

(oru kAtril)

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)

veedhi endroru veedum uNdu unakadhu sondhamendru 
vAnam endroru koorai uNdu vizhigaLum ariyAdhu 
vEliyillA sOlaikkAga vandhadhOr kAval 
kaNgal koNda deivamum 
kAvalaiyum koNdu sendradhEnO
 
(oru kAtril)
